gambit_interface module

Module containing helper functions for interface with GAMBIT.

pbarlike.gambit_interface.DRN_initialization(propagation_parameters, prop_model='DIFF.BRK', prevent_extrapolation=False, include_low_energy=False, production_xsection_cov=True, verbose=False)

Initializes DRNet, calculates secondary antiproton flux for the given propagation model for the entire multinest sample and initializes likelihoods for AMS-02 dataset; used at scan-level initialization.

Parameters

  • propagation_parameters (array) -- Usually dummy input from GAMBIT initialization file to make DRN default to multinest sample.

  • prop_model (str) -- "DIFF.BRK" or "INJ.BRK+vA"; default - "DIFF.BRK"

  • prevent_extrapolation (bool) -- decides if DRN should be allowed to predict in parameter regions outside trained region; default-False

  • include_low_energy (bool) -- Whether or not to include low energy region affected by solar modulation; default - False.

  • production_xsection_cov (bool) -- decides if covariance arising from antiproton production cross-section uncertainties should be included; default - True

  • verbose -- default - False

Returns

drn,sol_mod,loglike_ratios

Return type

objects

Note

  • GAMBIT currently uses pbarlike to obtain AMS-02 antiproton likelihoods by marginalizing over multinest sample.

  • Propagation parameters and propagation model are set in the GAMBIT initialization file.

  • The default choice is to marginalize over the multinest sample by setting faulty propagation parameters in the GAMBIT initialization file.

pbarlike.gambit_interface.br_fr(branching_fractions, sigma_v=1.0)

Recasts dictionary of key-value pairs of channels and branching fractions obtained from GAMBIT to format accepted by DarkRayNet

Parameters

branching_fractions (dictionary) -- Dictionary containing branching fractions for different channels obtained from gambit

Returns

branching fraction of channels accepted by DarkRayNet

Return type

array

pbarlike.gambit_interface.py_pbar_logLikes(drn, sol_mod, loglike_ratios, DM_mass, brfr, sigma_v=3.000544002443094e-26)

Used at every point in GAMBIT scan to obtain AMS-02 antiproton likelihood for antiproton production from DM annihilation and secondary origin.

Parameters

  • drn (object) -- Object of class DRNet

  • sol_mod (object) -- Eg. Force field approximation

  • loglike_ratios (object) -- Object of class LogLikeRatios

  • DM_mass (int, float, list, or 1D array) -- dark matter mass in GeV

  • brfr (list or array) -- branching fractions to specify the DM annihilation channel; format - [q qbar, c cbar, b bbar, t tbar, W+ W-, Z0 Z0, g g, h h]

  • sigma_v (int, float, list or 1D array) -- thermally averaged annihilation cross-section in \(cm^3s^{-1}\)

Returns

key-value pairs of log-likelihood ratios with correlated and uncorrelated errors.

Return type

dictionary
